name: Bash Slash
description:
Hi! This is one more game made by me, and I have a lot to say about it! I made this game a long time ago but never published it because I was driving the game to far, and in theory this game is just an endless runner, which is a thing that I don't want to develop that far. It was a fun experience when I was excited about it, but 3 months passed and I still had this game lying in my Unity Game Library. The game needed few things to be kinda completed. I learned a lot of coding and game design on those 3 months, and looking to my code and design choices that I made, gave me even less desire to work on the game. I removed a lot of things and just adjusted some of them and now the game is playable. Despite all of this, it was still a fun project and I've learned a lot! If you want to play the game there are some simple rules:

SPACE - Jump

A - Attack

YOU CAN'T KILL GHOSTS!

YOU CAN ONLY KILL KNIGHTS (those grey thingies haha) FROM THE TOP!

Have fun :)
